title: Mathematics: Calculus Problems
description: Solve the given calculus problems including derivatives, integrals, and limits. Show all steps for each solution.

title: Biology: Cellular Respiration
description: Write a detailed report on the process of cellular respiration, including its stages and significance in living organisms.

title: History: The Industrial Revolution
description: Discuss the causes and effects of the Industrial Revolution. Include key figures and technological advancements.

title: Physics: Newton's Laws of Motion
description: Conduct experiments to demonstrate Newton's three laws of motion. Document your methods, observations, and conclusions.

title: Literature: Shakespearean Analysis
description: Analyze the themes, characters, and plot of a chosen Shakespearean play. Provide textual evidence to support your analysis.

title: Chemistry: Chemical Reactions
description: Perform a series of chemical reactions and document the reactants, products, and reaction conditions.
